class_notes: Students with past experience in French must take placement exam and receive a French 101 placement to enroll.
course_description: Maximum of one year of high school French. This beginning-level course focuses on all aspects of communicating in French: in-class and group activities, reading, writing short compositions, listening, and speaking.
